document_data.name: Cone of Teeth
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cone of teeth''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[wizard]]s in [[Ser√¥s]].
document_data.Effects: This deadly spell created a rotating cone of water. The water on the edge of the cone took on the properties of [[shark]]'s teeth. A creature caught in the cone suffered extreme pain and damage. The size and strength of the cone depended on the caster's skill level.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]] in the form of a few teeth from a shark. The caster ate the teeth during casting.
